oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Yield responses of weed-free seeded onions [Allium cepa (L.)] to hoeing close to the row
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Melander, Senior scientist Bo
Hartvig, Technicians Peter
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Weed management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The paper contains results from field experiments looking at the possibilities for hoeing very close to the crop row in seeded onions.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Melander, Senior scientist Bo and Hartvig, Technicians Peter (1997) Yield responses of weed-free seeded onions [Allium cepa (L.)] to hoeing close to the row. Crop Protection, 16 (7), pp. 687-691.
